style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="225" y="469.5" width="315" height="190" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xmGGtw6VhnFhPmndvSPE-24" value="<div align="left">- REST API</div><div align="left">- DB Access</div><div align="left">- MQ Client (Paho MQTT)</div><div align="left">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;* Subscribe to `sensors/#`</div><div align="left">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;* Publish to `control/#`</div><div align="left">- WebSocket (push updates to frontend)</div><div align="left">- ORM (SQLAlchemy)</div><div align="left">- JWT, TLS</div><br><div align="left">- * Model Manager (Stores ML model files)</div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" build&nbsp;</div><div align="left">- Reverse proxy:</div><div align="left">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;* Svelte (/)&nbsp;</div><div align="left">&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;* Flask (/api:443)</div><div </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xmGGtw6VhnFhPmndvSPE-6" value="Mosquitto (MQTT Broker)" style="swimlane;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;startSize=23;" parent="1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-80" y="480" width="200" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xmGGtw6VhnFhPmndvSPE-36" value="<div>- Configures:&nbsp;</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;* listening ports</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;*&nbsp;Authentication via <code data-end="3713" data-start="3698">password_file</code> or client certs</div><div>&nbsp; &nbsp; &nbsp;* ACLs to restrict topics per client.</div><div>- QoS setup (1 for telemetry, 2 for critical commands)</div><div>- LWT</div>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;strokeColor=none;fillColor=none;align=left;verticalAlign=middle;rounded=0;" parent="xmGGtw6VhnFhPmndvSPE-6" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="10" y="26.75" width="180" height="131.25" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xmGGtw6VhnFhPmndvSPE-17" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="xmGGtw6VhnFhPmndvSPE-43" value="<div>- Large binary files</div><div>- Captured images</div><div>- ML models</div><div>- Logs or reports</div><div>- Anything that rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(238, 238, 238), rgb(32, 32, 32)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(54, 57, 61), rgb(186, 189, 192));

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 88px; height: 1px; padding-top: 15px; margin-left: 636px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));
